document.docAuthor: Vagalinski, Boyan, Golovatch, Sergei, Simaiakis, Stylianos Michail, Enghoff, Henrik & Stoev, Pavel

subSubSection.paragraph:

Distribution. Israel (
Golovatch et al ., 2004
), Cyprus (
Golovatch et al ., 2004
; present study). This is undoubtedly one of the most common millipede species on the island.
